name: Portal Maze
description:
Find the exit in this world portal maze (portals are invisable so you have no idea when you go thow them or where they are)

Also game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 111 (but i was kinda slow with uploading so idk)

Controls

WSDA and ArrowKeys = move

Space, Enter, x = shoot

R, Esc = Restart

by the way (Enemys cant go over portals so you can be suprised sometimes)
